messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com

I was just reading when Jesus was talking to the religious leaders and he told them that they honor me with their lips but their heart was far from them I feel that was me for a long time serving God with a heart full of lust and sexual sin i want to be free from fornication adultery harlotry masturbation perversion homosexuality pornography whoremonngering and all sexual sins I don't need will power I need the spirit to remove sexual sin out my life

Thank you for sharing your feelings. It's important to seek freedom from those struggles, and we're here to support you. 

You can pray for deliverance from these sins, as we believe in the power of prayer. Here’s a prayer you can use:

"Heavenly Father, I come before you today through the blood of Jesus Christ. I renounce all sexual sins that I have been involved in, including fornication, adultery, masturbation, pornography, and perversion. In the name of Jesus Christ, I break all curses of lust and ask for your Spirit to cleanse my heart and mind. I present my body to you as a living sacrifice and ask for your strength to overcome these temptations."

If you would like more resources or guidance, feel free to ask!
I need the holy Spirit to fill my life with godliness and holiness and give me the tools to resist all sexual sin as I feel helpless against this sins

It's great that you're seeking the Holy Spirit's guidance and strength. You can pray for the Holy Spirit to fill you with godliness and holiness. Here’s a prayer you might find helpful:

"Lord, I ask for your Holy Spirit to fill my life with your characteristics and attributes. Help me to walk in sexual purity and resist all temptations. I feel helpless on my own, but I trust in your power to overcome these struggles. Fill me with your strength and guide me in my journey towards holiness."

Remember, you're not alone in this journey. If you need further support or resources, just let me know!
A support group would be nice accountability partners and men praying for and with me

Absolutely! Joining a support group can be a great way to find accountability and encouragement. We can help connect you with a support group where you can meet others who are on a similar journey. 

If you’d like, I can provide you with more information on how to get involved. Just let me know!

I'm glad to hear that! While I don't have specific details on support groups at the moment, I encourage you to reach out to FightLust.com directly for information on how to connect with a support group. They can provide you with the resources and guidance you need to find accountability partners and prayer support. 

If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
I renounce and repent of f the ways I have missed God's name and my body through sexual sin

It's wonderful that you're taking this step to renounce and repent of those sins. Remember, God is faithful and just to forgive us our sins. If you'd like, I can guide you through a prayer for deliverance and healing. Would you like to proceed with that?

Here’s a sample prayer you can use:

"Dear Lord, I come before You with a humble heart. I renounce and repent of the ways I have sinned against You and my body through sexual sin. I ask for Your forgiveness and cleansing. Please help me to turn away from these temptations and fill me with Your strength and peace. Guide me on my journey towards healing and purity. Thank You for Your grace and love. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen."

Feel free to modify this prayer to reflect your personal feelings and struggles. If you need further support or resources, just let me know!

Thank you for pointing that out! If you meant to say "missed" instead of "misused," that's completely understandable. It's important to express your feelings accurately. 

If you'd like to share more or need further assistance, I'm here to help!

Got it! Thank you for clarifying. It's important to acknowledge how we've misused our bodies and seek healing. If you need further support or resources to help you on your journey, please let me know. I'm here to assist you!

I want God to break off the bonds and any soultie I had with prostitutes through sexual sin and to break off any soul ties I created with a married woman outside my marriage I want to repent and seek forgiveness and ask God to restore any damage I caused in my marriage or in the other parties life and restore me to being the husband he called me to be

It's wonderful that you're seeking repentance and restoration. Here's a prayer you can use to express your heart to God:

"Heavenly Father, I come before You today, acknowledging my sins and the bonds I have created through sexual sin. I ask You to break off any soul ties I have with prostitutes and with the married woman outside my marriage. I repent for my actions and seek Your forgiveness. Please restore any damage I have caused in my marriage and in the lives of others. Help me to be the husband You have called me to be. Fill me with Your Holy Spirit and guide me on the path of healing and purity. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen."

Feel free to modify this prayer to fit your personal struggles. If you need further support or resources, I'm here to help!
